metadata.title: CVE-2023-29457 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Reflected XSS attacks, occur when a malicious script is reflected off a webapplication to the victim's browser. The script can be activated throughAction form fields, which can be sent as request to a website with avulnerability that enables execution of malicious scripts.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
